entry.title: WIND WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 12:27 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.7°C
Pressure: 96.5 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: SW 35 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 70 km/h gusting to 100 this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 except minus 27 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 23 except minus 27 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
